words.source: H3318 (יָצָא, 'to go out'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he went out', ESV 'he went out', NASB 'he went out' — all agree
H3117 (יוֹם, 'day'), HRd/Ncmsa (preposition-with-article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the second day', ESV 'the next day', NASB 'the next day' — combined with next word
H8145 (שֵׁנִי, 'second'), HTd/Aomsa (article/adjective-ordinal-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'second', ESV 'next', NASB 'next' — all agree
H2009 (הִנֵּה, 'behold'), HC/Tm (conjunctive/demonstrative-particle); KJV 'and, behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'and behold' — all agree
H8147 (שְׁנַיִם, 'two'), HAcmdc (adjective-cardinal-masculine-dual-construct); KJV 'two', ESV 'two', NASB 'two' — all agree
H376 (אִישׁ, 'man'), HNcmpa (noun-common-masculine-plural-absolute); KJV 'men', ESV 'Hebrews', NASB 'Hebrews' — ESV/NASB combine with next word
H5680 (עִבְרִי, 'Hebrew'), HNgmpa (gentilic-noun-masculine-plural-absolute); KJV 'of the Hebrews', ESV 'Hebrews', NASB 'Hebrews' — all agree
H5327 (נָצָה, 'to struggle/fight'), HVNrmpa (Niphal-participle-masculine-plural-absolute); KJV 'strove together', ESV 'were fighting', NASB 'were fighting with each other' — all convey mutual combat
H559 (אָמַר, 'to say'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he said', ESV 'he said', NASB 'he said' — all agree

H7563 (רָשָׁע, 'wicked/guilty'), HRd/Aamsa (preposition-lamed-with-article/adjective-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'to him that did the wrong', ESV 'to the man in the wrong', NASB 'to the offender' — all convey the guilty party
H4100 (מָה, 'what'), HR/Ti (preposition-lamed/interrogative); KJV 'Wherefore', ESV 'Why', NASB 'Why' — all agree
H5221 (נָכָה, 'to strike/smite'), HVhi2ms (Hiphil-imperfect-2ms); KJV 'smitest thou', ESV 'do you strike', NASB 'are you striking' — all agree
H7453 (רֵעַ, 'friend/companion/neighbor'), HNcmsc/Sp2ms (noun-common-masculine-singular-construct/suffix-2ms); KJV 'thy fellow', ESV 'your companion', NASB 'your companion' — all agree
